Template reference

For designers of the parking pages

Variables

absolute_media_path

Fully-qualified path to the media of the parking page. Its value will differ based on how the system is setup. Example values:

  • /media/parking-pages/my-parking-page
  • http://media.n2vdns.com/parking-pages/my-parking-page

This variable is very important, and must be prepended to each external resources in the template. The easiest way to do this is using the <base> tag, which should be added it to the <head> of your templates. Example:

<head>
    ...
    <base href="{% templatetag openvariable %} absolute_base_path {% templatetag closevariable %}" />
    ...
</head>

domain

Contains the name of the domain the parking page is being served to. e.g. example.com
